Name: Belion
Desc: The true essence of martial arts is the lightness and purity of heart.

1.Name: Phoenix Ball Dance
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Active Skill</color>
Hurl a stone ball at the enemy, that bounces between them, dealing massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> to all enemies hit.

1.Name: Way of Clouds
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>
When there are 2 or more <color=#FFFFFF>Yunkui Summit</color> characters in your squad: Belion's DMG increases by 25%. When an Agent activates an <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, the cooldown of Belion's <color=#FFFFFF>Active Skill</color> is reduced by 4s. Can trigger up to 2 times. Belion's <color=#FFFFFF>Active Skill</color> refreshes the available trigger count.

2.Name: Way of Clouds
2.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>
When there are 2 or more <color=#FFFFFF>Yunkui Summit</color> characters in your squad: Belion's DMG increases by 31%. 1.Name: Silver Lion Crash
1.Desc:
